content:
From: Gerwin Klein <Gerwin.Klein@nicta.com.au>
The world desperately needed another blog, so here is one about proof and Isabelle.

This week: how to get Isabelle (outer) syntax highlighting in markdown and html.
http://proofcraft.org/blog/syntax-highlighting.html

Not all articles will be technical articles about Isabelle, but the plan is that thereâ€™ll be one every once in a while.
